articles.title: NFL strips Miami Dolphins of 2023 first-round pick, fines Stephen Ross $1.5M for tampering with Tom Brady, Sean Payton
articles.description: The NFL has stripped the Miami Dolphins of two draft picks, including their 2023 first-round selection, and suspended owner Stephen Ross and fined him $1.5 million as a result of its investigation of allegations levied by former coach Brian Flores.

articles.title: San Diego Padres agree to trade for Washington Nationals slugger Juan Soto, sources say
articles.description: Slugger Juan Soto, a two-time All-Star at age 23 who was the prize of this year's trade deadline, would head to the Padres along with first baseman Josh Bell after the teams agreed to a trade, sources told ESPN.
articles.content:
